message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your decision to purchase it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I am looking for a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a price closer to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $825000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and your budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the compromise, but I still feel that we might be able to reach a better agreement within my budget. I would like to counterpropose a price of $800000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get closer to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $800000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer $815000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and your budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to counterpropose a price of $805000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get closer to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $805000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer $812500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and your budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. I would like to counterpropose a price of $810000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get closer to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $810000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer $817500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and your budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I would like to counterpropose a price of $815000.
